page.title: 04BROOKSIDE SCHOOL
page.content: Brookside was opened in 1966 using new modern buildings and the original village school, first built in 1875.As the village has grown it has been extended twice,in 1968,when new classrooms were built on the main sight and in 1975 when a two classroom annexe was erected approximately one-third of a mile from the main buildings. It serves the west side of the village and has,at the present,365 children on roll. The school has good facilities for sport,having two playing fields,on one of which is an all-weather cricket wicket. Children enter school on the Tuesday after their fifth birthday and move to secondary education in their eleventh year.
